p:
Acetylthiocholine iodide (ATCl), acetylcholinesterase from Electrophorus electricus (electric eel) (AChE), bovine serum albumin (BSA), 5,5′-dithiobis [2-nitrobenzoic acid] (DTNB), butyrylcholinesterase from equine serum (BChE), S-butyrylthiocholine chloride and galantamine were purchased from Sigma Chemicals (St. Louis, MO, USA). HPLC grade methanol was purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). Formic acid was purchased from R & M Chemicals (United Kingdom). Marker compounds: 8-deoxygartanin (97.5% purity) was purchased from Chromadex (Irvine, CA, USA) while γ-mangostin (98.37% purity) and garcinone C (>98% purity) were obtained from Chengdu Biopurify (Chengdu, China). Mangostanol (>95% purity), 3-isomangostin (>90% purity) and α-mangostin (>95% purity) were isolated in-house following procedures described previously
14 .
